Summary: i was sky watching in my back yard looking at cass,from the north came a hourglass shaped tumbling thing
divs: Sighting Detailsstar gazing in my back yard kettering oh 8:44 pm motion caught my eye,the object i seen was very very fast crossing the sky in 6 or 7 seconds,from the north to the south,it seemed to be whitish grey in color,it was tumbling end over end and in total silence.this thing was in the sky not in space,its hard to gauge the elavation,10 to 20 thousand feet? its size was big, the speed and rotation was shocking to me, ive looked up for years and seen nothing but regular orbiting craft,meteors,ect. 200 meters by 75 meters is the best i can do about size estamation,the shape was hourglass form but the middle was not small like an hourglass it was almost as wide as the ends,it seemed 1 dimensional I.E almost flat, its rotation was steady its track linear,i still have goosebumps,WOW. the thing i seen was real,i will take a polygragh. thank you, c.w.s.
trends: There have been 40 other sightings in Dayton
There were no other sightings in Dayton on or around September 26th 2010
